action_data.action_text: You gain +1 CLOSE until the start of your next turn.
You gain +2 CLOSE until the start of your next turn.
You gain +3 CLOSE until the start of your next turn.
Target an Ally. The target may immediately move up to 2 spaces.
At the end of this turn you convert any unspent AP into the Wired 1 Condition instead of Evasive 1 and Quickened 1.
On a hit the target gains the Slowed 2, Restrained 2 and Hooked 1 Conditions.

ejection_seat.name: Ejection Seat
ejection_seat.extra_rules: When your Gear is destroyed, the next time you roll on the Gear Destruction & Injury table, you may choose to end the Encounter instead of rolling.

You gain +3 FAR and +8 SENSORS until the start of your next turn.

You gain +2 FAR and +5 SENSORS until the start of your next turn.
Immediately gain +2AP.

gas_pockets.name: Gas Pockets
gas_pockets.extra_rules: (After your Gear’s final Ballast has been determined)

Immediately gain +3AP.

hoist_of_the_demented.name: Hoist of the Demented
hoist_of_the_demented.extra_rules: After suffering a Meltdown you are unable to Engage this Internal until your next turn.

action_data.action_text: Immediately remove all marked damage from adjacent Hardpoints, diagonal or otherwise.

festering_heart.name: Festering Heart
festering_heart.extra_rules: You may only Engage this Internal once per Encounter.

action_data.action_text: On a hit the target gains the Hooked 3 Condition.

eisenfaust's_coffin.name: Eisenfaust's Coffin
eisenfaust's_coffin.extra_rules: After moving you are unable to Engage this Internal until your next turn.

action_data.action_text: Alternatively this internal may fire a lightning bolt, instead making a FAR attack with range 8.
On a hit you may move the target up to 4 spaces. They also gain the Drained 1 Condition.
Whenever you destroy a Fish using this Internal you gain the Wired 1 and Focused Conditions.  If a target would roll a Kill Check as a result of this Internal’s damage it is destroyed instead.
Target an Ally. The target receives the Ironclad 2 Condition.
Target a Hostile. The target gains the Doomed 3 Condition.

Target an Ally in range 2. You and your target lose any Hooked Conditions you have applied. You may then either:
● Give your Ally the Hooked Condition you lost.
● Give yourself the Hooked Condition your Ally lost.
The transferred Hooked Condition continues to affect its original Fish.
Remove all Marked Damage from this Internal.

galvanic_shielding.name: Galvanic Shielding
galvanic_shielding.extra_rules: After each Encounter you may remove all Marked damage from this Internal for free.
